file.content:
[package]
name = "chloe"
version = "0.1.0"
edition = "2024"

[dependencies]
# UI Framework
ratatui = "0.29"
crossterm = "0.28"

# Serialization & Persistence
serde = { version = "1.0", features = ["derive"] }
serde_json = "1.0"
uuid = { version = "1.0", features = ["v4", "serde"] }
chrono = { version = "0.4", features = ["serde"] }

# Terminal Emulation
portable-pty = "0.8"
vt100 = "0.15"

# Utilities
anyhow = "1.0"
dirs = "5.0"

# Git operations
git2 = "0.18"

# HTTP Client for AI Classification
reqwest = { version = "0.11", features = ["blocking", "json"] }

[lints.rust]
# SAFETY: This project forbids ALL unsafe code
unsafe_code = "forbid"

[lints.clippy]
# Pedantic lints for better code quality
pedantic = { level = "warn", priority = -1 }
# Specific lints to enable
nursery = { level = "warn", priority = -1 }
# Disable some overly pedantic lints
module_name_repetitions = "allow"
missing_errors_doc = "allow"
missing_panics_doc = "allow"

# SAFETY: Enforce thread safety
# Forbid unsafe threading patterns
undocumented_unsafe_blocks = "forbid"
